name: Practiced Defender
summary: After extensive practice with the Swords, you're comfortable enough with your shield to move at a normal pace with it raised.
description:
After extensive practice with the Swords, you're comfortable enough with your shield to move at a normal pace with it raised. You may use the Defend exploration activity while traveling at your full travel speed instead of half your travel speed.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
